name: Aquarium (itch) (qpatatesq)
description:
This is an aquarium, fish buy and sell game. *Make your fish 3 stars and earn more. *Collect pearls for new fish by selling fish. NOTE: I will try to add new fish and sound in next update. Do not forget to mention your suggestions and ideas in the comments, have fun.
Stars in fish level up every 30 seconds HOW TO PLAY B-->Market ESC-->Menu *Click on the fish for information about the fish.
